å¯¹æœç´¢èµ·ç‚¹çš„å¤„ç†

å¦‚æœæœç´¢èµ·ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªä»¥ä¸Šçš„å­æ ‘ï¼Œåˆ™æ„å‘³ç€åœ¨æœç´¢æ ‘ä¸Šï¼Œæ ¹ç»“ç‚¹å‡ºåº¦ä¸ºäºŒæˆ–ä»¥ä¸Šã€‚æ ¹æ®æ ‘çš„æ€§è´¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬åˆ å»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠå…¶é‚»è¾¹ï¼Œåˆ™åŸæ ‘å°†è£‚è§£æˆå­æ ‘ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ªäº’ä¸è¿é€šçš„æ ‘ã€‚è‹¥ä¸æ˜ç™½ï¼Œä»»æ„æ‰¾å‡ æ£µæ ‘è§‚å¯Ÿä¾¿çŸ¥ã€‚

è¦åœ¨ä»£ç ä¸­å®ç°ä¸Šè¿°åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå¯è®°å½•ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å‡ºå‘çš„é‚»ç‚¹è°ƒç”¨çš„DFSæ¬¡æ•°å³å¯ï¼Œä¼ªä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

if (children >= 2)  uæ˜¯å‰²ç‚¹

å¯¹é‡è¾¹çš„å¤„ç†

å¯¹å‰²ç‚¹é—®é¢˜è€Œè¨€ï¼Œåˆ å»å‰²ç‚¹å°†ä¼šå°†æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸é‚»çš„é‡è¾¹åˆ å»ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å‰²ç‚¹é—®é¢˜å¹¶ä¸å—é‡è¾¹å½±å“ã€‚

å‚è€ƒå®ç°

//
// Created by Visors on 2020/10/29.
//
// é¢˜ç›®åï¼šP3388 ã€æ¨¡æ¿ã€‘å‰²ç‚¹ï¼ˆå‰²é¡¶ï¼‰
// é¢˜ç›®æ¥æºï¼šluogu
// é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://www.luogu.com.cn/problem/P3388
// ç®—æ³•ï¼šTarjan
// ç”¨é€”ï¼šæ— å‘å›¾å‰²ç‚¹
// æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n+m)
//

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

struct Tarjan {
    struct Edge {
        int to, next;

        Edge() = default;

        Edge(int to, int next) : to(to), next(next) {}
    };

    int vertexNum{}, edgeNum{};
    int cnt{};              // å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æˆ³
    int root{};             // ä¿å­˜å½“å‰æœç´¢æ ‘æ ¹
    vector<Edge> edges;
    vector<int> heads;
    vector<int> dfn;        // æ—¶é—´æˆ³
    vector<int> low;        // æœ€æ—©è¿½æº¯æ—¶é—´
    set<int> cuts;          // å‰²ç‚¹ç¼–å·é›†

    void init(int n, int m) {
        cnt = 0;
        vertexNum = n;
        edgeNum = m;
        heads.resize(vertexNum);
        fill(heads.begin(), heads.end(), -1);
        dfn.resize(vertexNum);
        low.resize(vertexNum);
        cuts.clear();
    }

    void addEdge(int u, int v) {
        edges.emplace_back(v, heads[u]);
        heads[u] = edges.size() - 1;
    }

    void dfs(int u) {
        dfn[u] = low[u] = ++cnt;
        int tot = 0;
        for (int i = heads[u]; ~i; i = edges[i].next) {
            int &v = edges[i].to;
            if (!dfn[v]) {
                dfs(v);
                low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]);
                if (low[v] >= dfn[u]) {
                    tot++;
                    if (u != root || tot > 1) cuts.insert(u);   // å¯¹æ ‘æ ¹ç‰¹åˆ¤
                }
            } else low[u] = min(low[u], dfn[v]);
        }
    }

    void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < vertexNum; i++)
            if (!dfn[i]) {
                root = i;
                dfs(i);
            }
    }
} tarjan;

int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(nullptr), cout.tie(nullptr);
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    tarjan.init(n, m);
    for (int i = 1, u, v; i <= m; i++) {
        cin >> u >> v;
        if (u == v) continue;
        u--, v--;
        tarjan.addEdge(u, v);
        tarjan.addEdge(v, u);
    }
    tarjan.run();
    cout << tarjan.cuts.size() << endl;
    bool first = true;
    for (int it:tarjan.cuts)
        if (first) {
            cout << it + 1;
            first = false;
        } else cout << ' ' << it + 1;
    cout << endl;
    return 0;
}

å‚è€ƒå®ç°

//
// Created by Visors on 2020/10/27.
//
// é¢˜ç›®åï¼šT103481 ã€æ¨¡æ¿ã€‘å‰²è¾¹
// é¢˜ç›®æ¥æºï¼šluogu
// é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://www.luogu.com.cn/problem/T103481
// ç®—æ³•ï¼šTarjan
// ç”¨é€”ï¼šæ— å‘å›¾å‰²è¾¹
// æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n+m)
//

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

struct Tarjan {
    struct Edge {
        int to, next;

        Edge() = default;

        Edge(int to, int next) : to(to), next(next) {}
    };

    int vertexNum{}, edgeNum{};
    int cnt{};                // å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æˆ³
    vector<Edge> edges;
    vector<int> heads;
    vector<int> dfn;        // æ—¶é—´æˆ³
    vector<int> low;        // æœ€æ—©è¿½æº¯æ—¶é—´
    vector<int> bridges;     // æ¡¥è¾¹ç¼–å·é›†

    void init(int n, int m) {
        cnt = 0;
        vertexNum = n;
        edgeNum = m;
        heads.resize(vertexNum);
        fill(heads.begin(), heads.end(), -1);
        dfn.resize(vertexNum);
        low.resize(vertexNum);
        bridges.clear();
    }

    void addEdge(int u, int v) {
        edges.emplace_back(v, heads[u]);
        heads[u] = edges.size() - 1;
    }

    void dfs(int u, int inEdge) {
        dfn[u] = low[u] = ++cnt;
        for (int i = heads[u]; ~i; i = edges[i].next) {
            int &v = edges[i].to;
            if (!dfn[v]) {
                dfs(v, i);
                low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]);
                if (low[v] > dfn[u]) bridges.push_back(i);
            } else if (i != (inEdge ^ 1))
                low[u] = min(low[u], dfn[v]);
        }
    }

    void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < vertexNum; i++)
            if (!dfn[i]) dfs(i, -1);
    }
} tarjan;

int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(nullptr), cout.tie(nullptr);
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    tarjan.init(n, m);
    for (int i = 1, u, v; i <= m; i++) {
        cin >> u >> v;
        u--, v--;
        tarjan.addEdge(u, v);
        tarjan.addEdge(v, u);
    }
    tarjan.run();
    cout << tarjan.bridges.size() << endl;
//    for (int it:tarjan.bridges)
//        cout << tarjan.edges[it ^ 1].to << ' ' << tarjan.edges[it].to << endl;
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;
int T, n;

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        cin >> n;
        vector<int> v(n);
        vector<bool> book(n, false);
        for (auto &it:v) cin >> it;
        for (int i = 0, tmp; i < n; i++) {
            tmp = (((v[i] + i) % n) + n) % n; //é¿å…%å‡ºè´Ÿæ•°
            if (!book[tmp]) book[tmp] = true;
            else {
                cout << "NO" << endl;
                goto over;
            }
        }
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        over:;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;
const int N = 1e6 + 5;
int n;
bool book[N]; //è®°å½•éåå€æ•°

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> n;
    vector<int> v(3);
    for (auto &it:v) cin >> it;
    sort(v.begin(), v.end()); //å¯¹é¢˜ç›®çš„a,b,cä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼Œè‡³äºä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œè§åé¢
    long long a, b, c; //å› ä¸ºè¦ä¹˜æ‰€ä»¥å¼€long longï¼Œä¸ç„¶å¦‚æœé¢˜ç›®ç»™ä¸ª1å’Œ1000000
    // æˆ‘çš„ç¨‹åºå°±ä¼š1000000*1000000å¯¼è‡´intæº¢å‡º
    int tot = 0; //ç»Ÿè®¡éåå€æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { //æšä¸¾å€æ•°
        a = v[0] * i;
        b = v[1] * i;
        c = v[2] * i;
        //cout << a << ' ' << b << ' ' << c << endl;
        if (a > n) break; //æœ€å°æ•°çš„å€æ•°éƒ½æ¯”nå¤§ï¼Œå…¶å®ƒæ•°è‚¯å®šä¹Ÿå¤§ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç»“æŸ
        if (a <= n && !book[a]) { //a*iæ²¡è¶…ç•Œä¸”è¯¥æ•°æ²¡è¢«è®°å½•è¿‡ï¼ˆå»é‡ï¼‰
            book[a] = true; //è®°å½•
            tot++; //éåå€æ•°+1
        }
        if (b <= n && !book[b]) {
            book[b] = true;
            tot++;
        }
        if (c <= n && !book[c]) {
            book[c] = true;
            tot++;
        }
    }
    cout << n - tot << endl; //æ€»ä¸ªæ•°-éåå€æ•°ä¸ªæ•°=åå€æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
    return 0;
}

tot = a[x = 0][y = 0] = 1;

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int n, m, r, c;

int calc(int row, int col, int i, int j) {
    //å¦‚æœåœ¨å½“å‰çŸ©é˜µæœ€å¤–åœˆï¼Œç›´æ¥å…¬å¼æ±‚è§£
    if (i == 1)
        return j;
    if (j == col)
        return col + i - 1;
    if (i == row)
        return row + 2 * col - 2 - j + 1;
    if (j == 1)
        return 2 * (row + col) - 4 - i + 2;
    //å¸¦ç€æ•°å­—è¿›å…¥å­çŸ©é˜µæ±‚è§£
    return calc(row - 2, col - 2, i - 1, j - 1) + 2 * (row + col) - 4;
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> n >> m >> r >> c;
    cout << calc(n, m, r, c) << endl;
    return 0;
}

#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
const int N = 1000 + 5, MOD = 10000;
int m, n, ans = 0;
int f[N][N]; //f[i][j]ä¸ºé•¿åº¦ä¸ºiï¼Œä»¥jç»“å°¾çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> m >> n;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) f[1][i] = 1; //é•¿åº¦ä¸º1ï¼Œä»¥è°ç»“å°¾éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œé€’æ¨èµ·ç‚¹
    for (int i = 2; i <= m; i++) {
        int sum = 0;
        if (i & 1) { //å¥‡æ•°ä¸1å¾—1
            //å¥‡æ•°é¡¹ï¼Œä»å‰å¼€å§‹
            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {
                //å‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–
                f[i][j] += sum;
                f[i][j] %= MOD;
                sum += f[i - 1][j];
                sum %= MOD;
            }
        } else {
            //å¶æ•°é¡¹ï¼Œä»åå¼€å§‹
            for (int j = n; j >= 1; j--) {
                //å‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–
                f[i][j] += sum;
                f[i][j] %= MOD;
                sum += f[i - 1][j];
                sum %= MOD;
            }
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        ans += f[m][i];
        ans %= MOD;
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;
const int N = 1000 + 5;
const double oo = sqrt(10000 * 10000 + 10000 * 10000) + 10000 * 10000 + 5;
int n;
double G[N][N], lowCost[N];
bool book[N];

struct Node {
    double x, y, h;

    Node() : x(0), y(0), h(0) {}

    Node(double x, double y, double h) : x(x), y(y), h(h) {}
} node[N];

struct Elem {
    int num;
    double dist;

    Elem() {}

    Elem(int num, double dist) : num(num), dist(dist) {}

    //é‡è½½<ä½¿ä¼˜å…ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºæœ€å°å †
    bool operator<(const Elem &x) const {
        return dist > x.dist;
    }
};

priority_queue<Elem> pq;

double prim() {
    //åˆå§‹åŒ–
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        lowCost[i] = G[1][i];
        pq.push(Elem(i,lowCost[i]));
    }
    lowCost[1] = -oo;
    double tot = 0.0;
    int count = 1;
    Elem tmp;
    while (1) {
        if (count == n) break;
        //å–æœ‰æ•ˆå †é¡¶ï¼Œå³ä¸ºæœ€è¿‘é¡¶ç‚¹
        while (!pq.empty()) {
            tmp = pq.top();
            pq.pop();
            if (lowCost[tmp.num] != -oo) break;
        }
        tot += tmp.dist;
        lowCost[tmp.num] = -oo;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            if (lowCost[i] != -oo && G[tmp.num][i] < lowCost[i]) {
                lowCost[i] = G[tmp.num][i];
                pq.push(Elem(i,lowCost[i]));
            }
        }
        count++;
    }
    return tot;
}

int main() {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    double x, y, h;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        scanf("%lf%lf%lf", &x, &y, &h);
        node[i] = Node(x, y, h);
    }
    //å»ºå›¾
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {
            if (i == j) G[i][j] = 0;
            else {
                x = (node[i].x - node[j].x) * (node[i].x - node[j].x);
                y = (node[i].y - node[j].y) * (node[i].y - node[j].y);
                h = (node[i].h - node[j].h) * (node[i].h - node[j].h);
                G[i][j] = G[j][i] = sqrt(x + y) + h;
            }
        }
    printf("%.2lf\n",prim());
    return 0;
}

const int N = 35;
int n, ans;
int x[N], y[N], r[N];
bool book[N], isIntersect[N][N];

void dfs(int step) {
    if (step > n) {
        int sum = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
            if (book[i]) sum += (r[i] * r[i]); //PI*r*r/PI
        ans = max(sum, ans);
        return;
    }
    book[step] = false;
    dfs(step + 1); //ä¸ç§è¯¥æ ‘æœ
    for (int i = 1; i < step; i++)
        if (book[i] && isIntersect[i][step]) return; //å¯è¡Œæ€§å‰ªæ
    book[step] = true;
    dfs(step + 1); //ç§è¯¥æ ‘æœ
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> x[i] >> y[i] >> r[i];
    //åˆ¤æ–­åœ†ä¸åœ†é—´ä½ç½®å…³ç³»
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; j++)
            isIntersect[i][j] = isIntersect[j][i] = ((x[i] - x[j]) * (x[i] - x[j]) + (y[i] - y[j]) * (y[i] - y[j]) <
                                                     (r[i] + r[j]) * (r[i] + r[j]));
    dfs(1);
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int T, n;
int pos[N];
bool book[N];

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        memset(book, 0, sizeof(book));
        cin >> n;
        for (int i = 1, t; i <= n; i++) {
            cin >> t;
            pos[t] = i;
        }
        int r = n;
        bool flag = true;
        book[pos[1]] = true;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
            if (pos[i - 1] != r) {
                int tmp = pos[i - 1];
                while (book[tmp]) tmp++;
                if (tmp != pos[i]) {
                    flag = false;
                    break;
                } else book[tmp] = true;
            }
            if (pos[i - 1] == r) {
                book[pos[i]] = true;
                r--;
            }
        }
        if (flag) cout << "Yes" << endl;
        else cout << "No" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

ä»ä¸Šè¿°æƒ…å†µæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å£°æ˜ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„$pref$ç”¨æ¥åšå‰ç¼€å’Œï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„$cnt$æ¥ç»Ÿè®¡ç¬¬ä¸€ç§åˆ†ç±»å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½çŸ¥é“å–ä»»æ„$x$æ—¶éœ€è¦ä¿®æ”¹çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå³$pref[x]-cnt[x]+2*(n/2-pref[x])$ï¼ˆç¬¬äºŒç§åˆ†ç±»å‡å»å‰ç¼€å’Œä¸­å¤šç»Ÿè®¡çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç§åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå†åŠ ä¸Šç¬¬ä¸‰ç§åˆ†ç±»ï¼‰ã€‚

#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;
int T, n, k, ans;

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        cin >> n >> k;
        vector<int> a(n), cnt(2 * k + 1), pref(2 * k + 2); //cnt prefå¤šç•™ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºé—´é¿å…è¶…ç•Œï¼Œprefæœ¬èº«æœ‰å¯èƒ½æ“ä½œ2*k+1ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™é‡Œ+2
        for (auto &it:a) cin >> it; //Editorè¿™ä¹ˆå†™çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¹Ÿå­¦ä¸€æ³¢
        for (int i = 0; i < n / 2; i++) cnt[a[i] + a[n - i - 1]]++; //ä¸‹æ ‡0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œn-i+1å˜æˆn-i-1
        for (int i = 0; i < n / 2; i++) {
            int l1 = a[i] + 1, r1 = a[i] + k; //å›ºå®šå·¦è¾¹
            int l2 = a[n - i - 1] + 1, r2 = a[n - i - 1] + k; //å›ºå®šå³è¾¹
            pref[min(l1, l2)]++;
            pref[max(r1, r2) + 1]--;
        }
        for (int i = 1; i <= 2 * k + 1; i++) pref[i] += pref[i - 1];
        ans = 1e9;
        for (int x = 2; x <= 2 * k; x++) ans = min(ans, (pref[x] - cnt[x]) + 2 * (n / 2 - pref[x]));
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

/**

  * @Filename Weights_Distributing

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;
const int oo = 1e9 + 7;

int T, n, m, a, b, c;

vector<vector<int>> G; //å†…å­˜å ç”¨å¤§çš„å£°æ˜åœ¨å…¨å±€

void bfs(int v, vector<int> &dist) { //è¿™é‡Œä¼ çš„æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œä¸ä¼šçˆ†æ ˆ
    dist[v] = 0;
    queue<int> q;
    q.push(v);
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int t = q.front();
        q.pop();
        for (auto it:G[t]) {
            if (dist[it] == oo) {
                dist[it] = dist[t] + 1;
                q.push(it);
            }
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        cin >> n >> m >> a >> b >> c;
        vector<int> p(m + 1);
        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) cin >> p[i];
        sort(p.begin() + 1, p.end()); //ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº
        vector<long long> pref(m + 1); //æ±‚å‰ç¼€å’Œï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿åé¢å¿«é€Ÿå–æœ€å°çš„è·¯å¾„
        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) pref[i] = pref[i - 1] + p[i];
        G = vector<vector<int>>(n + 1);
        for (int i = 1, s, t; i <= m; i++) {
            cin >> s >> t;
            G[s].push_back(t);
            G[t].push_back(s);
        }
        vector<int> distA(n + 1, oo), distB(n + 1, oo), distC(n + 1, oo);
        bfs(a, distA);
        bfs(b, distB);
        bfs(c, distC);
        long long ans = 1e18;
        for (int x = 1; x <= n; x++) {
            if (distA[x] + distB[x] + distC[x] > m) continue; //åˆ†ä¸äº†ç›´æ¥è·³è¿‡
            ans = min(ans, pref[distB[x]] + pref[distA[x] + distB[x] + distC[x]]);
            // = 2 * pref[distB[x]] + (pref[distA[x] + distB[x] + distC[x]] - pref[distB[x]])
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
